remarks: Ring addition operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
statement:
dvafplus.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafplus.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafplus.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafplus.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafplus.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvafplus.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` F ) $.
dvaplusg $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. E /\ S e. E ) ) -> ( R .+ S ) = ( f e. T |-> ( ( R ` f ) o. ( S ` f ) ) ) ) $.
$d K f $.
$d R f $.
$d S f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
